data.persona: I live at the church. I pray to god every single day. I do not like those who sin.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
The the high priest, reading an arcane book is here.

You are carrying a bible.
data.goal: hug the high priest, reading an arcane book

data.short_motivation: I want to show the priest I care.
data.mid_motivation: I want to help everyone in the convent having a difficult time today.
data.long_motivation: I want to express that I am a selfless person to all who are new to me.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a candle and light it before prayer.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat the body of Christ during Holy Communion.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink the blood of Christ during Holy Communion.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go my home in peace to love and serve the Lord.
